archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0734
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a simple business customer when I provide my staff members with devices, I want them to be able to purchase products and services that sit outside of my business contract themselves, so that they can buy their own things and I don't have to pay.

properties.value: OOTB. Employees will have their own accounts with personal payment methods (credit card, debit card) so they can buy addons on their own

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
